special_text:
Kicker {WU}{WU} [i](You may pay an additional {WU}{WU} as you cast this spell.)[/i]
When Aina enters, if she was kicked, put a kinship counter on her. She gains “You may activate Aina’s abilities twice each turn rather than only once.”
[+1]: Untap target land.
[-2]: Until end of turn, target land you control gains “{T}: Create a 3/2 green Spirit creature token.”
[-8]: You get an emblem with “At the beginning of each combat, untap all lands you control.”
